home.aboutBody: I'm Milan, a UESCA Certified Triathlon Coach. I coach runners, cyclists, and triathletes with a simple goal: turn your effort into consistent progress. We use data (pace, power, HR, lactate when available) but decisions are guided by context and RPE—so the plan stays realistic, not theoretical.
aboutBullets: Style: individualization, progressive overload, recovery respect

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This page explains how personal data is handled when you contact me or book a call.

sections.title: 1. Who is responsible for this website
sections.body: This website is operated by Milan Margetic. The easiest way to contact me is via the contact form on this website.

sections.title: 2. What personal data I collect
sections.body: If you contact me, I may collect the information you choose to provide, such as: name, email address, sport, time zone, preferred contact method, and your message.

sections.title: 3. Why I use this data
sections.body: I use this data only to respond to your inquiry, communicate with you, and (if you choose) discuss or provide coaching services.

sections.title: 4. Service providers (where the data goes)
sections.body: Contact form submissions may be processed by Formspree (form delivery). If you book a call, scheduling may be handled by Calendly. Video calls may be hosted via Google Meet. These providers process personal data according to their own privacy policies.

sections.title: 5. How long I keep your data
sections.body: I keep messages only as long as needed to respond and follow up. If you become a coaching client, I may keep relevant communication for a reasonable period for service delivery and administration. You can request deletion at any time.

sections.title: 6. Your rights
sections.body: Depending on your location (including the European Union), you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact me via the website contact form.

sections.title: 7. Cookies
sections.body: This website does not use marketing or tracking cookies. If that changes in the future, this policy will be updated.

sections.title: 8. Questions
sections.body: If you have questions about privacy on this website, contact me via the contact form.

sections.title: Professional services
sections.body: Coaching services are educational and training-related. They do not replace medical advice. If you have a medical condition or symptoms, consult a qualified healthcare professional.
